sequence.call: { 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'entryToBeModified' : '%s/aci/aci_bindtypes/%s' % (STAGED_DATA_DIR,curr_aci_ldif_file) }
sequence.message: 'ACI: Bind Types: userdn with filter, user searching targeted entry with group member'

{ 'returnString' : returnString , 'testString' : 'dn: uid=dmillertwo,uid=dmillerone,uid=dmiller,ou=People,ou=aci branch,o=Bind Type Tests,o=ACI Tests' }
sequence.message: 'ACI: Bind Types: userdn with filter, user searching in non-targeted branch with group member'

sequence.message: 'ACI: Bind Types: userdn with filter, admin deleting aci'
sequence.call: { 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'entryToBeModified' : '%s/aci/aci_bindtypes/del_aci.ldif' % STAGED_DATA_DIR }
sequence.message: 'ACI: Bind Types: userdn with filter, user searching previously targeted entry'
